definition: down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action
Ba state during Zhou dynasty (in east of modern Sichuan)/abbr. for east Sichuan or Chongqing/surname Ba/abbr. for Palestine or Palestinian/abbr. for Pakistan

to long for/to wish/to cling to/to stick to/sth that sticks/close to/next to/spread open/informal abbr. for bus 巴士[ba1 shi4]/bar (unit of pressure)/nominalizing suffix on certain nouns, such as 尾巴[wei3 ba5], tail

sentences.english: She tilted her face to kiss me quickly on the chin.
sentences.chinese: 她侧过脸飞快地在我下巴上亲了一下。
丹若有所思地摩挲着下巴。

sentences.english: The profile of the old warrior was characterized by a strong jaw and an aquiline nose.
sentences.chinese: 老战士侧面像的特征是一个坚硬的下巴和一个鹰钩鼻。

sentences.english: If you have a triangle shaped face, this means that you have a pointy chin.
sentences.chinese: 如果你有一张三角型的脸，这意味着你有一个尖下巴。

sentences.english: I'm getting a double chin. I'd better lose some weight.
sentences.chinese: 我双下巴越来越明显，最好减肥。

sentences.english: The schoolgirl developed long legs, her jawline changed, she had her hair cut.
sentences.chinese: 她双腿变得修长，下巴轮廓变了，头发也剪短了。

sentences.english: He looks upward so that his double chin doesn't show.
sentences.chinese: 他抬头往上看，以使他的双下巴看不见。

sentences.english: As I tend to shave my chin last, I asked him why.
sentences.chinese: 但我却倾向于最后刮下巴，所以我问他这是为什么。

sentences.english: Look at that slightly stubbly chin.
sentences.chinese: 看那下巴上精心修过的胡渣。

sentences.english: He tagged his opponent on the jaw.
The chinless man climbed back into his place.
sentences.chinese: 没有下巴颏儿的人爬回到他原来的地方。

sentences.english: I hit him on the chin.
sentences.chinese: 我冲他的下巴打了一拳。

sentences.english: Any lower and you'll look like you have a double chin.
sentences.chinese: 若相机位置过低，你就会看起来有双下巴。

sentences.english: The puff of white hair at the end of Swyft's chin quivered in outrage.
sentences.chinese: 斯威夫特下巴末端的胡须因为愤怒抖动着。

sentences.english: Lying in a den in Bombay , with a slack jaw and not much to say.
sentences.chinese: 躺在孟买的一个密室里，下巴都懒得动，不想说什么。

definition: temple (on the sides of human head)
